sdmscenario.title: Toxische stof v2.00
sdmscenario.description:
You are the mayor of Trouveen. At the 7th of June at 2 o'clock in the afternoon, your AOV-worker comes running in. An accident has happened at the Havenstraat. A German truck from JGM Spedition is on its side at the roundabout. The fuel tanks behind the vehicle cabin are on fire. Fortunately, the driver was able to leave the burning truck just in time. The tank behind the cabin is heated by the fire. The orange sign on the back of the truck indicates that the tank contains a dangerous substance with number 1093/336 (Acrylonitrile). That means: vapors very toxic, do not breathe, very flammable, keep away from heat, sparks or open fire. You ask how the accident could have happened, because dangerous goods transports normally are not allowed to drive there. The answer is simple: the routing for hazardous substances has been temporarily adjusted because of a road diversion.
Although the CoPI and ROT are only just operational, after a short consultation with the operational manager you decide to call a core policy team together to get things started. It is difficult to extinguish the tanker truck; due to the risk of explosion, the fire department must approach the tanker from a distance.
sdmscenario.mouseover: A German tanker truck with flammable and toxic contents is lying on its side near the roundabout in your town.

dilemma.title: Pick up children
dilemma.name: Pick up children
dilemma.situationdescription: Because of the potential explosion hazard, the CoPI and ROT plan to evacuate the surrounding area within a radius of 300 meters around the burning truck. An emergency ordinance is being prepared. Within the evacuation radius is a daycare centre. The police are sent to the nursery to assist with the evacuation, because every child care provider is able to attend to at most four children. It is expected that there will also be parents who want to pick up the children themselves. Are you allowing them to come to the day nursery and assist with the evacuation, or do you lock down the area?

info.title: Exception
info.name: Exception14281
info.description: In the emergency regulation we can make an exception for the parents who help with the evacuation. That can be done legally.

info.title: Taking risks
info.name: Taking risks16011
info.description: Evacuating is our job. We can not bear the responsibility that parents themselves must take risks to help us with the evacuation.

info.title: Light work
info.name: Light work7445
info.description: The parents might become emotional when we try to stop them. It is better to let them help with the evacuation. Many hands make light work.

info.title: Disruption process
info.name: Disruption process14779
info.description: If traffic comes into the area from the opposite direction, that disrupts our process. Consequently do not let parents into the area.

info.title: Unclear message
info.name: Unclear message9599
info.description: If parents are allowed to pick up their own children, it will get confusing for everyone. Some have to get out of the area, others are allowed to come into the area. This is an unclear message.

dilemma.question: Will you prohibit parents from picking up their own children from the evacuation area?

dilemma.title: Laconic
dilemma.name: Laconic
dilemma.situationdescription: Residents in an area up to 500 meter around the tanker truck are asked to stay inside and be extra cautious. You also issue an emergency ordinance for this second ring in the area. The police verbally informed the residents inside the enclosed area and pointed at the prohibition of smoking and open flames. Windows and doors have to remain shut. Some residents still go out onto the street. They do laconic over the instruction and make video-recordings with their phones.

info.title: Quick work
info.name: Quick work6998
info.description: We have to make quick work with this, otherwise the emergency ordinance becomes pointless.

info.title: No idea
info.name: No idea4918
info.description: These sort of people have no idea of the risk they take.

info.title: Raise aggression
info.name: Raise aggression713
info.description: I think, that we should rather appeal on the residents to point out to each other to stay inside. If we act harsh, this raises new aggressions.

info.title: Communicate seriousness
info.name: communicate seriousness4271
info.description: It seems, that we did not communicate the seriousness of the situation well enough. We should emphasize this first.

info.title: Violate emergency ordinance
info.name: Violate emergency ordinance10229
info.description: If they violate the emergency ordinance, they can be banished from the area.

dilemma.question: Will you ban people who do not follow the instructions from the area?

dilemma.title: Exams
dilemma.name: Exams
dilemma.situationdescription:
The operational leader decides to precautionary evacuate the area between 300 and 500 meter around the tanker truck. Because of the drought not enough water is available to cool the tanker truck well. The water has to be supplied from elsewhere. You agree to the evacuation as suggested by the ROT.
The "Burgermeester J.H.H. Mansschool" is located 450 meters from the tanker truck. This secondary school is going to be asked to start the evacuation on its own. Police assistance is on its way. While you examine the arisen situation, the principal of the secondary school calls. He wonders whether you are aware of what you are doing with the precautionary evacuation. At the moment the school is about to be evacuated, except for the gym hall. Here the HAVO/VWO final exams in English are taken at the moment. You did not - to be fully honest - realize that at all. He asks whether you know for sure that you want to also evacuate the sport hall and to stop the final exams.

info.title: Hurried evacuation
info.name: Hurried evacuation5527
info.description: We have to stop it now. If we wait we take the risk that we still have to evacuate them in haste.

info.title: Precautious evacuation
info.name: Precautious evacuation10917
info.description: It is precautious. Then it goes far to let 300 children have a retake. This is barely explainable.

info.title: Educational inspection
info.name: Educational inspection9574
info.description: I ask myself if you are allowed to just stop the finals. Is it not a matter for the educational inspection?

info.title: Exam son
info.name: Exam son4346
info.description: My son is in the hall. It is a precautious evacuation and thus does not seem strictly necessary.

info.title: Negotiation of safety circles
info.name: Negotiation of safety circles7734
info.description: If we start to negotiate with the safety circles, than there is no telling what will happen for us. Everyone has to get out of the area, now.

dilemma.question: Are you ordering to stop the exam?

dilemma.title: Train
dilemma.name: Train
dilemma.situationdescription: The truck was the cause that an international train stranded at the station of Trouveen; because the danger circle also includes the rail, the train cannot go on. There is a delegation of the "women of Srebrenica" in the train, who are on their way to the International Court in The Hague. Approximately 150 passengers are taken care of in a sports hall close to the station, where they are provided with coffee, tea and cake.

info.title: Boost for staff
info.name: Boost for staff1771
info.description: If you would just show up in the shelter hall, that would also give a boost to the staff of the municipality.

info.title: Loco-mayor
info.name: Loco-mayor7544
info.description: Nobody is indispensable. Your role in the crisis team can be fulfilled by the loco-mayor. You can fairly leave for half an hour.

info.title: Stay available
info.name: Stay available1457
info.description: You should remain inside the city hall. That way you are easily available for the operational leader. This is the best for the sake of this crisis.

info.title: Precarious stable
info.name: Precarious stable10805
info.description: The situation is stable, but precarious. A captain has to stay on board. In other words: in the crisis team your presence now is desired.

info.title: Show involvement
info.name: Show involvement1546
info.description: It is good to show your involvement to the stranded travellers also. You have to fulfill your role as figurehead.

dilemma.question: Are you visiting the sports hall to heighten the mood of the passengers?

dilemma.title: Tight curve
dilemma.name: Tight curve
dilemma.situationdescription:
A professor of transport safety informs from Delft, that she is shocked of the incident in Trouveen. At the same time, she does not hold back that she warned about these kinds of accidents for some time. In the media the professor says, that she guesses that the accident a cause of the traffic situation on-site. On television she says: "We notice quite often that diversion routes are not inadequate because of the tight curves. In 2012 we did research on this, and in 63% of the investigated cases it seemed that diversion routes did not fulfill the requirements."
By now you know better; From an initial interview the police concluded that the driver was distracted. He sent an sms-message to his girlfriend in Stuttgart while he was driving.

info.title: Research council
info.name: Research council9595
info.description: This statement is of later concern. The research council for safety will investigate this undoubtedly and prove otherwise in about a year.

info.title: Too early
info.name: Too early12812
info.description: This kind of statements is of all times. People will understand that at the moment it is still too early to announce the cause.

info.title: Better things to do
info.name: Better things to do1524
info.description: Just let her be. You have better things to do than to react to that.

info.title: Shut down
info.name: Shut down6980
info.description: You have to immediately shut down these kind of rumours. Otherwise this will take on a life on its own.

info.title: Fire department mistake
info.name: Fire department mistake1848
info.description: The diversion routes are not the cause. It will fall back onto the fire department, now that it seems that we made mistakes, while that is not the case.

dilemma.question: Are you going to immediately react on the statement of the professor?

dilemma.title: Laboratory
dilemma.name: Laboratory
dilemma.situationdescription: In the meantime the municipality was warned by the director of a laboratory of a pharmaceutical research institute, that his lab is at risk due to the operation. It seems that because of heat, smoke and dust particles expensive equipment is threatened to be damaged. The sensors, that seal the rooms with virusses from the outside world, are impacted. This can be resolved by building a big water screen at the institute. The only disadvantage here is that it will evoke questions. Until now it was always kept a secret what kind of exotic virusses were stored in the lab.

info.title: Risks are known
info.name: Risks are known11763
info.description: We are aware of the risk and in the ROT the current deployment strategy is determined. We do not have to start playing a ROT here in the policy team.

info.title: Outbreak virus
info.name: Outbreak virus14193
info.description: At the moment we cannot have an outbreak of a virus in the lab.

info.title: Underestimate
info.name: Underestimate9549
info.description: It seems that the ROT underestimates the risk of a virus outbreak. You have to assign them to build a water screen at the lab.

info.title: Cool the tanker truck
info.name: Cool the tanker truck12768
info.description: The risk at the tanker truck is bigger; if the deployment changens it takes more time to extinguish the flames. We can rather do everything possible to cool the tanker truck and to extinguish the fire.

info.title: Safety first
info.name: Safety first14519
info.description: We will explain the story later on. The safety of the residents is more important at the moment.

dilemma.question: Will you assign your operational leader to change the deployment strategy?

dilemma.title: Youth news
dilemma.name: Youth news
dilemma.situationdescription:
The burning tanker truck is in the meantime national news. You give a short statement to the press, in which you explain the current situation to the media: "It concerns a tanker truck with Acrylonitril. The cabin of the tanker truck caught fire. The tanker truck is getting radiated and warmer, but until now it is not burning. Up until now the situation is stable. The fire department attempts to cool the tanker truck, which limits the chance of an explosion." Your spokesman gives the 1-to-1 interviews and explains that you hope to have more information later this day.
The Youth news also came to Trouveen and asks you to give a short description of the accident, because the press statement is according to the journalist unsuitable voor the adolescent viewers.
The Youth news wants that you explain in simple words to the children what happened today. The Youth news wants to know three things from you. Is it dangerous, are the things in the tanker truck toxic and whether the tank will or will not explode.

info.title: Prevent confusion
info.name: Prevent confusion14965
info.description: You provide the press statement differently now, which could cause confusion for the other media. Confusion is the one thing we have to prevent.

info.title: It was enough
info.name: It was enough8153
info.description: We have to make sure to not waste time by speaking up to the media. You have fulfilled your obligations. It was enough with the media.

info.title: Layman's terms
info.name: Layman's terms6663
info.description: I think that the message is nuanced for the Youth news. Risks cannot be explained in layman's terms.

info.title: Key message
info.name: Key message6825
info.description: We have drafted a nice key message, thus you will figure it out.

info.title: Explain to everyone
info.name: Explain to everyone14250
info.description: You have to be able to explain to everyone. That includes the children of Trouveen.

dilemma.question: Are you talking to the Youth news?

dilemma.title: Explosion
dilemma.name: Explosion
dilemma.situationdescription: The incident evolved around 5 o'clock in the afternoon very fast in short time. After the paint of the tanker truck starts to peel off, it breaks open and it comes to an explosion. Three firemen of Trouveen were hit deadly by scattering pieces of the tanker truck. The dejection in the different crisis teams is huge. The question arises who will inform the families of the deceased firemen. The commandant of the fire department suggests to join the police and to inform the families together.

info.title: Good suggestion
info.name: Good suggestion12180
info.description: That is a good suggestion of the fire department commandant.

info.title: Why not
info.name: Why not15427
info.description: In case the fire department commandant likes the idea too, I see no reason why we should not do it.

info.title: Known well
info.name: Known well5243
info.description: I think that the families would like to hear these news the most from the fire department commandant they know well.

info.title: Deliver news myself
info.name: Deliver news myself15999
info.description: I know the people and the families. I want to deliver the news myself.

info.title: Pairs of two
info.name: Pairs of two6990
info.description: Usually we notify the families in pairs of two. But it is a good idea to make a pair of the fire department and the police.

dilemma.question: Do you agree with the suggestion of the commandant?

article.title: Fire department loses three deputies in accident with dangerous substance.
article.intro: Trouveen. Trouveen is in deep mourning.

paragraph.intro: After the explosion at 5 o'clock this afternoon in which three firemen were killed, the flags are being flown half-mast everywhere throughout Trouveen. The whole incident did not go smoothly and we are eagerly awaiting the evaluation, both from the municipality itself and the inspection.
paragraph.textyes: It started this afternoon with a big chaos in the street parallel to the roundabout where the accident happened. Parents were able to enter the area and thus a chaos arose in front of the adjoining primary school.
paragraph.textno: Because the mayor forbade the parents to pick up their child from school, there was a big commotion near the entrance to the evacuation area, but also near the buses with which the children left the area.
paragraph.textunanswered: Because the mayor was waiting with the decision whether or not parents were allowed to pick up their child from the primary school, chaos ensued in the municipality.

paragraph.intro: Eventually it turned out that parents could pick up their child at the new church. However, it took a long time for parents to get there because of the chaos that had arisen. After a long time it appeared that the sports complex used for the exams was also within the limits of the preventive evacuation area.
paragraph.textyes: The mayor called for an evacuation of all exam candidates. The candidates are now complaining that they could have completed the exam. The sports hall was not damaged during the explosion. Candidates and their parents have filed a complaint with the school council.
paragraph.textno: Parents believe that the mayor has taken a lot of risks by letting the exams continue. Some students indicated that they smelled strange odors.
paragraph.textunanswered: Due to the lack of a decision by the mayor, some parents went to the sports hall to take their teenagers away from the evacuation area. However, it was unclear what had to happen. Some candidates managed to complete their exam.

paragraph.intro: Later in the day there was confusion about the deployment. A laboratory from a pharmaceutical research institute instructed the mayor to install a water screen.
paragraph.textyes: Although the capacity for this was lacking and his expert had advised against it, the mayor decided to adapt the deployment strategy himself.
paragraph.textno: The mayor indicated that he understood the director of the laboratory, but that after consulting with his expert - the operational manager - he had decided that the current strategy would be maintained.
paragraph.textunanswered: The mayor did not respond to this. The director of the laboratory indicated that he is currently contacting his lawyers, because "this is not acceptable".

paragraph.textyes: The mayor was on show at the youth news. It was a clear story for many residents of Trouveen. "We should be glad that our municipality still exists", one of the bystanders concluded.
paragraph.textno: During the news item about the accident with the truck in the youth news, only the back of the mayor was visible. A professor of Transport Safety commented during the rest of the news item.
paragraph.textunanswered: The journalist of the youth news briefly spoke with a number of children about why they thought their mayor did not want to join the broadcast. One of the little rascals thought it was because he had to go to the ladies of the Milosevic, but it was clear that he did not think of that himself.

paragraph.intro: The mayor told our journalist that the decision to appear in the youth news was the most difficult in this crisis. Until it turned out that the tanker truck had exploded; it hurt him a lot to hear that three of the firefighters had died.
paragraph.textyes: Because it was decided to let the Police be accompanied at the 'notice' of the death, the last widow was only reached late at night. She had already heard the story from colleagues, but had to wait unnecessarily long for the official message.
paragraph.textno: The mayor maintained the position that the police should inform the widows, and that the fire service commander had to do his own 'round'. Both Fire department and Police do not understand the commotion, but have decided not to argue with the municipality out of consideration for the next of kin.
paragraph.textunanswered: Waiting for the mayor's decision took a long time. After waiting for 60 minutes to officially inform the next of kin, the Police and Fire department implemented their own plan.

article.ending:
.
The widows feel supported by the residents of Trouveen who are leaving flowers and teddybears near the roundabout. As editors, we would also like to wish them strength to sustain them during this difficult time.

article.articletitle: Fire department loses three deputies in accident with dangerous substance.
article.articleintro: Trouveen. Trouveen is in deep mourning.
article.articletext:
After the explosion at 5 o'clock this afternoon in which three firemen were killed, the flags are being flown half-mast everywhere throughout Trouveen. The whole incident did not go smoothly and we are eagerly awaiting the evaluation, both from the municipality itself and the inspection. It started this afternoon with a big chaos in the street parallel to the roundabout where the accident happened. Parents were able to enter the area and thus a chaos arose in front of the adjoining primary school.
Eventually it turned out that parents could pick up their child at the new church. However, it took a long time for parents to get there because of the chaos that had arisen. After a long time it appeared that the sports complex used for the exams was also within the limits of the preventive evacuation area. Parents believe that the mayor has taken a lot of risks by letting the exams continue. Some students indicated that they smelled strange odors.
Later in the day there was confusion about the deployment. A laboratory from a pharmaceutical research institute instructed the mayor to install a water screen. Although the capacity for this was lacking and his expert had advised against it, the mayor decided to adapt the deployment strategy himself.
The mayor was on show at the youth news. It was a clear story for many residents of Trouveen. "We should be glad that our municipality still exists", one of the bystanders concluded.
The mayor told our journalist that the decision to appear in the youth news was the most difficult in this crisis. Until it turned out that the tanker truck had exploded; it hurt him a lot to hear that three of the firefighters had died.
Because it was decided to let the Police be accompanied at the 'notice' of the death, the last widow was only reached late at night. She had already heard the story from colleagues, but had to wait unnecessarily long for the official message.
article.articleending:
.
The widows feel supported by the residents of Trouveen who are leaving flowers and teddybears near the roundabout. As editors, we would also like to wish them strength to sustain them during this difficult time.

Will you ban people who do not follow the instructions from the area?
Are you ordering to stop the exam?
Are you visiting the sports hall to heighten the mood of the passengers?
Are you going to immediately react on the statement of the professor?
Will you assign your operational leader to change the deployment strategy?
Are you talking to the Youth news?
Do you agree with the suggestion of the commandant?
Will you prohibit parents from picking up their own children from the evacuation area?
Will you ban people who do not follow the instructions from the area?

Are you visiting the sports hall to heighten the mood of the passengers?
Are you going to immediately react on the statement of the professor?
Will you assign your operational leader to change the deployment strategy?
Are you talking to the Youth news?
Do you agree with the suggestion of the commandant?
